name: Goddess XoXo
description:
Goddess XoXo is a slice-of-life visual novel in where the player explores the themes of love, friendship, loyalty, and morality. 

Three goddesses have accidentally found themselves on Earth and it is up to you to guide them! Through your guidance the three goddesses will learn about Earth and the humans that inhabit it.

However, tensions rise as the differences in Goddess traditions and humanity begin to surface. 

Goddess XoXo is DedDanGames' first game. This project was Kickstarted in April of 2018.

Feautures:

- 3 Endings

- 14 CGs

- 5.5 hours of content

If you choose to play Goddess XoXo, we thank you! 

Known Issues/Bugs:

- The skip function causes certain assets to not load properly. Use sparingly.

- Escape button closes the game with out warning!(sorry!)

If you have any questions or want to contact DedDanGames you can do so through the message system or find us on Twitter!
